vpsissCalFrameEventNotifyCfg Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » - CAL Config API

CAL could be configured to notify application on end of frame or on reception of first X lines. More...

#include <vps_cfgcal.h>

Detailed Description

CAL could be configured to notify application on end of frame or on reception of first X lines.

struct vpsissCalFrameEventNotifyCfg

Limitation on first x lines callback : Currently this can be enabled for one stream and stream should be of type VPS_ISS_CAL_TAG_PIX_DATA

Field Documentation

Fvid2_SubFrameCbFxn vpsissCalFrameEventNotifyCfg::appCb

Application callback

uint32_t vpsissCalFrameEventNotifyCfg::notifyAfterEndOfFrame[VPS_ISS_CAL_MAX_STREAMS]

Will call the application provided callback, after reception of End Of Frame short packet

uint32_t vpsissCalFrameEventNotifyCfg::notifyAfterFirstXLines[VPS_ISS_CAL_MAX_STREAMS]

Will call the application provided callback, after reception of number of lines specified here. Restriction : This can be supported for only VPS_ISS_CAL_MAX_X_LINE_MONITOR_CNT virtual channel

uint32_t vpsissCalFrameEventNotifyCfg::numStream

Number of streams, which requires to be monitored for end of frame, and or first X lines

void* vpsissCalFrameEventNotifyCfg::pAdditionalArgs

Not used for now - should be set to NULL

uint32_t vpsissCalFrameEventNotifyCfg::streamId[VPS_ISS_CAL_MAX_STREAMS]

Specify the stream ID, which requires to be monitored
